soen6441.team01.warzone.model

Class SoftwareFactoryModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • soen6441.team01.warzone.model.SoftwareFactoryModel

  • public class SoftwareFactoryModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the Software Factory design pattern to manage the set of objects that define the respective classes for the different Warzone models.

    • Constructor Summary
